reviews.title: Great family outing!
reviews.author: Hoagy
reviews.content: Fabulous time; kids (10 and 9) loved the Mine room! Great way to spend an afternoon off the slopes. Dirk and crew were terrific in helping us but also letting us figure things out!

reviews.title: Livermore, CA
reviews.author: Kristina M.
reviews.content: What an incredible and fun experience! We are a multigenerational bunch who worked together to solve the murder mystery. Hints were given so we wouldn't get stuck or go completely down the wrong path. We've only done two escape rooms, and this was by far the best of the two.

reviews.title: Great escape room!
reviews.author: Vincent O.
reviews.content: A great escape room! We (three adults) did the Parlor - murder mystery. The room was a lot of fun, with all sorts of puzzles. The puzzles ranged in scale and type, and they were arranged in parallel so that different groups of people could do different puzzles at the same time. We've done dozens of escape rooms, and this is one of our favorites. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Great memories and family fun
reviews.author: Jade D.
reviews.content: We have been to Escape Room Park City twice. We did the Mine Trap as a family with our three oldest, ages 11, 9, and 7. We had a fantastic time and took our oldest back to do The Parlor with his friends for his 12th birthday. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: A blast for the entire family
reviews.author: Ellen G.
reviews.content: We had the best time! I thought the puzzles were challenging but well suited for different ages and levels. We have 12-19 in ages and everyone had a blast.

image.alt: A blast for the entire family

reviews.title: Ski vacation
reviews.author: Bryan S.
reviews.content: Park City escapes rooms was amazing. Pirates Booty escape room was well done and a lot of fun. We will do another room next time we visit Park City. Many in our group thought it was their favorite escape room to date. A must do if you are in the area.

reviews.title: Super Fun Thanksgiving Week Outing!
reviews.author: Janene C.
reviews.content: This was the best escape room we've ever done. We appreciated the help when help was needed. The detail that went into this room was impressive! My kids said this was one of their most favorite parts of our Park City getaway.

reviews.title: Team Building Fun
reviews.author: Candaceaud
reviews.content: While in the area for a corporate event, was able to secure a reservation easily. Fun and engaging way to complete a team building activity. Would return again for personal or business use.

reviews.title: Fun Fun Family Time!
reviews.author: Mama Wendy
reviews.content: We have gone to a few different Escape Rooms and this was our favorite! The oldest in our party was 52 and the youngest was 16. So fun! Very clever use of props. We did the PC Mine room. My daughter did the Pirate Room a few weeks ago and she loved it! Dirk was a great host. He left very clever hints. We'll definitely return!

reviews.title: Escape Room Fun
reviews.author: FWF N
reviews.content: We celebrated our daughter's 9 birthday on Sun with a group of family! We did the pirate room and it was a blast! The room itself was so detailed and cool! We did escape with the help of a few clues! I would highly recommend this experience!

reviews.title: Super fun family experience!!
reviews.author: 369californiagirl
reviews.content: We did Escape Room Park City's Mine Trap room this week to celebrate my birthday and thoroughly enjoyed our time. We had my two teens, my husband, and parents (70s) and there was something for everyone! We have done a few escape rooms before and this was the best- well thought out, well constructed, exciting and fun! We did need some clues to help us at times but would highly recommend. 5 star experience! Thank you Escape Room Park City!

reviews.title: Awesome Family Experience
reviews.author: FellowTraveler755107
reviews.content: We had such a blast escaping from the Silver Mine! The game was challenging, creative and great with our 4 adults and 2 kids (12 + 9). Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Would do another one again!!
reviews.author: Ttklein40
reviews.content: We had an absolute blast doing the miners escape room. We made it thru with 5 minutes to go. The 90 minutes flew by. There were all kinds of puzzles- jigsaw, logic, map and others. I highly recommend this for a fun evening. Also Portia was absolutely fantastic helping us.

reviews.title: A good time with me mateys
reviews.author: memoholland
reviews.content: Our group of 8 escaped from the Pirate's Booty room. The clues were unique, varied, and fairly challenging. We had a great time!

image.alt: A good time with me mateys

reviews.title: Fun Evening with Adult Kids
reviews.author: Serenamom
reviews.content: Pirate Adventure was so fun and just the right amount of difficulty for our family of 8 - each used their own set of skills to solve the riddles - great entertainment and Parker was a good instructor!

reviews.title: Best Family Fun
reviews.author: Diane
reviews.content: Wow! This far exceeded our expectations. We have two girls (10 and 12) and we werenâ€™t sure they would enjoy this, but it was a highlight of our week. We did the Minetrap room and the entire time our girls were engrossed with trying to figure out the clues. What made the experience was Dirk, as he kept us on track and provided clues when he saw we were losing it. Pure fun for adults and the kids. Would 100% recommend!

reviews.title: Terrific way to spend an hour
reviews.author: tyegator
reviews.content: Had a great time! Extremely well done. Great puzzles. Fun afternoon with friends. Did The Parlor whodunit which allowed the 5 of us to have the room to ourselves.

reviews.title: So much fun!!
reviews.author: Sean O.
reviews.content: Excellent from start to finish! Intro was good, our guide was engaging, room was creative, fun and challenging. The clues were helpful without giving too much away. We had a really large group and there were enough challenges to keep everyone as busy as they wanted to be. Our group ranged in age from 16-62 (2 families) and everyone had a chance to contribute.

reviews.title: Family fun
reviews.author: Arthur E.
reviews.content: The 6 of us in our family really enjoyed the mine room. It was a lot of fun. While we found it challenging it was very do able. Ea h one of us contributed a fairly significant part which was really nice.

reviews.title: Park City escape Room - great activity in Park City
reviews.author: Ross D.
reviews.content: The room was very creative and challenging. The staff was friendly, fun, and professional. Best activity in Park City.
